extendedInfo.description: âââ Chapter is the best Shared Journaling app for couples!ââ Chapter is like an Evernote for two!â Chapter captures and organizes all the intimate moments between couples!== You wanted to write a shared Diary/Journal with your girlfriend/boyfriend?== You thought that Facebook timeline is never as organized as Evernote does?== You thought that you can't express the true "YOU" on Facebook, Twitter or even Path?== You fell in love with someone but never dare to speak out?== You always wanted to have a "Life journal" that captures every beautiful and lovely moment in your life?If YES! Then why not try Chapter shared journal/diary app, to solve all your problems between couples!Features include:â Pair up with your favorite person and share the life path together!â Creates private timeline between you and your lovely couple partner by uploading moods on stickers for free!â Comment on his/her sticker and get notifications about your lovely partner's updates instantly!â Create "Chapter" of your life and fill them with your precious stickers of moment! â Love Chapter if you are in long distance relationships!â All your personal data are safe with the cloud server and private only for you!â Keep all stickers organized in the way you want just as Evernote does!â Various patterns to choose for stickers, you will always find your favorite ones for your shared journal/diary!â Instantly share your thoughts between you and your lovely partner on this shared journal/diary!â Expect a tangible Chapter journal diary book / personalized postcard sent to you couples in the near future!Chapter is very different from other apps made for couples such as Couple, Between, Avocado or Pair. Chapter is very focused on writing a shared journal together! remember all those precious moments along the path in life.Checkout our Weibo as well: http://weibo.com/u/3107470567Now, Pair up with the one who you care the most, share moments only between two of you and create your personalized Chapter book now!

reviews.title: cute but..
reviews.comment: this is totally gorgeous and cute but I can\'t upload any photo. Every time I choose photo from gallery or take new photo it won\'t appear. not cute again :(( please fix it please :(( My phone is S3 Mini running on JB 4.1.2 thanks guys.
reviews.author: Ime Hasina

reviews.title: Won\'t let me pair!
reviews.comment: This thing won\'t let me pair up with my girlfriend. She sent me the invite I clicked on it and it didn\'t work. Now it won\'t let me send her another email because it says she\'s already paired up...  pos
reviews.author: Steve Praizner

reviews.title: Useful and cute
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for three days. It is definitely a cute and thoughtful app. Just one thing about a post it would be awesome If more pictuees can be posted for one post  keep up the good work:) (definitely like this over avocado)
reviews.author: Annie Chang

reviews.title: Searching feature
reviews.comment: Can we have the search feature?
reviews.author: Lim Yang Wei

reviews.title: Word limit!
reviews.comment: Please remove word limit. Otherwise it\'s a very thoughtful app. It makes it so much easier for me and my boyfriend, who is in the States while I am in India, to share thoughts and photos :\')
reviews.author: Prerona Sanyal

reviews.title: Word limit sucks
reviews.comment: I dun understand what is the nee n reason of word limit in this app??? I try yo share millions of my thoughts n moments but not able to write more than 230 words i think it is a big disaster with lovers. Even a single thought is not completed in 230 words plx remove this limit. N there must be an option of editing a moment after being posted,which is absent in the app. Plx solve these issues asap.
reviews.author: Aliza Baloch

reviews.title: Month overview
reviews.comment: I wish that this app could show monthly overview to see significant events posted to that date
reviews.author: ron sauve

reviews.title: What about increasing the word limit?
reviews.comment: We have some long write ups that we want to share and we\'re not able to do so. Please remove the word limit. It actually makes it very hard to share much.
reviews.author: Mayank Jain

reviews.title: Create a version for iOS!!!!
reviews.comment: The concept is great, UI is great. But I can\'t use it because my boyfriend uses an iPhone. PLEASE create an iOS version. And also extend the character limit. 230 characters is too less.
reviews.author: Parul Singh

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: this is really the best journal keeping app ever.
reviews.author: Lifeng Wang

reviews.title: Good for long distant dating
reviews.comment: Very helpful in sharing photo and experience. It\'s quite easy to use.
reviews.author: Xuejing He

reviews.title: Life saver
reviews.comment: Me and my gf almost broke up bc of a lack of communication but this app saved our relationship
reviews.author: Michael Cho

reviews.title: Just what my partner and I are looking for!!!
reviews.comment: Amazing. Its just like between. But these apps need to be made for us tech geeks! Tablet mode please!!!
reviews.author: Christopher Silva

reviews.title: good design and great idea
reviews.comment: i like the chapter functionality very much
reviews.author: Cassie yu
